padhai-shuru-karein_key3: Google Chrome download kar kar install karo. Chrome browser yaha - https://www.google.com/chrome/ se milega.
padhai-shuru-karein_key4: Apne facilitator ko bol kar apni navgurukul.org wali email ID banwao. Uske baad uss se gmail.com par login karo.
padhai-shuru-karein_key6: Iss video ko use karke `Terminal` use karna seekho. Iss Video ko dekh kar yeh exercise karo.
padhai-shuru-karein_key8: Iska aapka Atom `Editor` install ho jayega. Atom `editor` mei hi aap apni saari exercises karoge.
padhai-shuru-karein_key10: Pehla ek mahina aapka pehla programming session `Python` naam ki language mei hoga, and doosra programming session HTML/CSS mei hoga.
padhai-shuru-karein_key11: `Python` seekhne ke liye aapko saral.navgurukul.org use karna hai.
padhai-shuru-karein_key12: `Python` ki exercies ko karne ke liye aapko Pycharm install karna padega. Pycharm ek `editor` hai jo aapki `python` ki exercises karne mei help karega. Isko install karne ke liye niche di gayi commands ko `terminal` mei run kare:
padhai-shuru-karein_key13: HTML/CSS ki exercises ke liye aapko Brackets ki jarurat padegi. Brackets bhi ek `editor` jo aapki HTML/CSS ki exercises mei help karega. Isko install karne ke liye niche di gayi commands ko `terminal` par run kare:
padhai-shuru-karein_key15: English learning start karne ke liye, pehle is link ko use karke Google classroom kholein: https://classroom.google.com/
padhai-shuru-karein_key16: Is `code` ko use karke 'Life Skills' ka classroom join karein: mxrnr0
padhai-shuru-karein_key17: Apne baseline assessment tests dein: http://www.languagelevel.com/english/
padhai-shuru-karein_key19: Apne tests ke score ko is sheet me record karein: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JQNtvbBWpCVkH8s_uxQSQt6c13MakNuMltc2n44imA8/edit?usp=sharing
